text: Manzanninsu suka ce "Ashe, akwai shakka a cikin (sha'anin) Allah, Mai Æ™aga halittar sammai da Æ™asa Yana kiran ku domin Ya gafarta muku zunubanku, kuma Ya jinkirta muku zuwa ga ajali ambatacce?" Suka ce: "Ba ku zama ba face mutane misalinmu kuma nufinku ku kange mu daga abin da iyayenmu suka kasance suna bautawa sai ku zo mana da dalili mabayyani
